content.question: Which of the following best describes the acceleration vector for the particle at the moment shown in the diagram?

choices.label: It is directed toward the left.
It is directed toward the bottom of the page.
It is directed toward the top of the page.
It has components directed toward the right and toward the bottom of the page.
It has components directed toward the left and toward the bottom of the page.

content.answer: It has components directed toward the left and toward the bottom of the page.
